entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:43 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
